item.title: 2022 Switzerland Pack List
item.description: I recently had the fortune of going to Switzerland to visit with my friend in and around Bern. Using my friend’s place as a home base, we did several bike loops out of Bern, including a few train assisted sections and an overnight trip.

item.title: RAGBRAI XLVIII Recap
item.description: Knolling my RAGBRAI packlist I just got back from another year of RAGBRAI. Wasn’t sure if it would actually happen because of the new wave of COVID-19 cases.

item.title: Follow-Up: RAGBRAI XLV (2017) Pack List
item.description: Knolling my RAGBRAI packlist Here is a follow-up to my previous post. Based on this year, I made some last minute decisions on what to pack.

item.title: RAGBRAI XLV (2017) Pack List
item.description: Knolling my RAGBRAI packlist I have been on RAGBRAI (Des Moines Register’s Annual Great Bike Ride Across Iowa) several times since 2005.
